document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">wild </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Blue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">sky </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">abreast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Winds </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">threatened </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">run </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">crouched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">behind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Door </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">defiant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">conflict </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">upper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">friends </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">genial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">main </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">deplore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">peculiarly </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">arrogant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Campaign </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A wild blue sky abreast of winds
